Description.Text: Facilities Guests are welcomed at the hotel, which has a total of 74 rooms. The accommodation offers various services and facilities, including a restaurant, a dining area, a bar, room service, a conference room and a business centre, for a comfortable and relaxing stay. Wireless internet access is available to travellers in the public areas. Those arriving in their own vehicles can leave them in the car park of the establishment. Rooms The hotel features rooms with air conditioning and a bathroom. A double bed ensures a good night's sleep. There is also a safe. A fridge and a mini fridge are provided as standard. Other features include internet access, a TV and WiFi. The bathroom offers convenient facilities including a shower. A hairdryer is also available. The accommodation offers non-smoking rooms. Sports/Entertainment The terrace is a great place to while away the time. The establishment offers guests a range of leisure and recreation facilities, including a gym (for a fee). Meals Breakfast can be booked.
